mapper.select: select mem_no , mem_id , mem_pwd , mem_name , mem_nickname , gender , to_char(enroll_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "enroll_date" , mem_status , mem_mbti , mem_email , mem_img from tb_member where mem_id = #{memId} and mem_status = 'Y'
select count(*) from tb_member where mem_id = #{checkId}
select count(*) from tb_member where mem_nickname = #{checkNickname}
select count(*) from tb_member where mem_email = #{email}
select mem_no , mem_id , mem_name , mem_email from tb_member where mem_name = #{memName} and mem_email =#{email} and mem_status = 'Y'

select mem_no , mem_id , mem_pwd , mem_name , mem_nickname , gender , to_char(enroll_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "enroll_date" , mem_status , mem_mbti , mem_email , mem_img from tb_member where mem_name = #{memName} and mem_id = #{memId} and mem_email = #{email} and mem_status = 'Y'
mapper.update: update tb_member set mem_nickname = null , mem_status = 'N' , mem_email = null where mem_id= #{memId}
mapper.select: select p.post_no , p.partner_type , p.partner_original_img , p.partner_title , p.partner_content , p.partner_start_date , p.partner_end_date , s.area_category_title , m.gender , m.mem_nickname , m.mem_mbti , m.mem_img , m.mem_no , m.mem_id from tb_partner p inner join tb_member m on p.mem_no = m.mem_no inner join tb_spot_area_category s on p.area_category_no = s.area_category_no where partner_status = 'Y' and m.mem_no = #{memNo} order by post_no desc
select folder_no , mem_no , folder_name , mem_nickname from tb_bookmark_folder join tb_member using (mem_no) where mem_no = #{memNo}
select mem_no , mem_id , mem_name , mem_nickname , gender , mem_mbti , mem_email , mem_img from tb_member where mem_no = #{memNo}
select * from tb_bookmark join tb_travel_spot using (spot_no) where folder_no = #{folderNo}
select * from tb_travel_spot join tb_travel_spot_like using(spot_no) where mem_no = #{memNo}
